title: On nature's trail
creator_credit: Jason Rosenfield and National Geographic Society
brief_description: Four young nature enthusiasts meet each Saturday morning in their local park where they let their imagination roam free, while learning many principles of ecology as they relate to everyday life. Suitable for Mid-Upper Primary level students.
